org.jpws.pwslib.global

Class PassphraseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.pwslib.global.PassphraseUtils

  • public class PassphraseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility class to generate random password values complying to a given PwsPassphrasePolicy.

    See also PwsPassphrasePolicy

    Since:
    0-3-0
    Author:
    Kevin Preece, Wolfgang Keller (slightly modified)

    • Method Detail

      • makePassword

        public static char[] makePassword(PwsPassphrasePolicy policy)
                           throws InvalidPassphrasePolicy
        Generates a new random password according to the policy supplied.
        Parameters:
        policy - the PwsPassphrasePolicy policy
        Returns:
        A new random password.
        Throws:
        InvalidPassphrasePolicy

      • isWeakPassword

        public static boolean isWeakPassword(char[] password)
        Checks the password against a set of rules to determine whether it is considered weak. The rules are:

        • It is at least MIN_PASSWORD_LEN characters long.
        • At least one lowercase character.
        • At least one uppercase character.
        • At least one digit or symbol character.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to check.
        Returns:
        true if the password is considered to be weak, false otherwise.
